1100110010001110 1001100110110010 1 -> sum: 0110011001000001, cout: 1
0111010000000010 0111010100001001 0 -> sum: 1110100100001011, cout: 0
1100110101001110 0010010000000001 1 -> sum: 1111000101010000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
